name: CBD Critical Mass
description: CBD Critical Mass by Dinafem Seeds is a breeding collaboration in search of truly medicinal properties. According to Dinafem, this strain came out of a genetic mashup between the in-house Critical Mass and an undisclosed strain from CBD Crew. CBD Critical Mass has a 1:1 CBD/THC ratio and generally more pronounced indica-dominant effects. This genetic cross is known to yield an abundant harvest, but plan on supporting the plant’s vigorous growth before flowering. Dinafem recommends utilizing this strain for anorexia, insomnia, muscle pain, and depression.
descriptionPlain: CBD Critical Mass by Dinafem Seeds is a breeding collaboration in search of truly medicinal properties. Dinafem recommends utilizing this strain for anorexia, insomnia, muscle pain, and depression.

highlightedReviews.text:
This strain should be famous. I picked some up at Farma in Portland. If you like CBD you have to try this. It's hard to find CBD weed that leans Indica, which this one does. Extremely (seriously) well rounded full body high that makes me think there must be something very special going on with the cannabinoid and terpene profile in this particular strain. Every time I smoke it it's perfect. I'm very picky about strains because I have a super low tolerance and the differences between them really affect me. CBD Critical Mass makes me feel like I'm smoking weed that has a 100 percent guarantee of no thc induced anxiety. Frankly, it's brilliant stuff. Like I said, it should be famous. Unfortunately I live in LA and can't find it out here. I wish dispensaries would start carrying it, and growers out here would start growing it. It's Critical Mass so it should have a huge yield. Seems like it would be a grower's dream. No matter what level of weed smoker you are, you should try this. Especially if you love the magical 1:1 ratio of thc:cbd.

You know what it feels like? Feels like I imagined the weed that Gandalf is smoking in Lord of the Rings would feel.

What a wonderful full body high. Didn’t make me too tired but relaxed me completely. I was pretty focused for an indica, but really helped relax my body after a big run. Taste was quite bland and herby but the result is worth it.
